overview: My Brothers' Crossing is the true story about a tragic accident that happened in August 2015. In remote southwest Virginia, during the time when we were experiencing riots and racial hate crimes, an African-American man is involved in a horrific accident which claims the lives of Bobby and Pam Clarkâ€”a Caucasian couple. What followed was a community rising up, blind to our different heritages, to heal and show incredible forgiveness in the wake of this tragedy.
tagline: The true story from southwest Virginia where an African-American man in involved in an unspeakable accident that claims 2 lives but results in amazing forgiveness and healing.
title: My Brothers' Crossing
